Group hierarchy: Increase the number of Web Server and Application Server EC2 Instances from 2 to 6 for faning out requests
Change instance type of Web Server from t3.large to t3.2xlarge that has higher number of VCPUs
Change instance type of Application Server from c5n.large to c5n.4xlarge that has higher number of VCPUs
For increasing database vertical scale, change instance type from db.m1.xlarge to db.m4.4xlarge
Keep database snapshots for more number of days by increasing the size for Backup Processed for Export from 10000 GB to 35000 per month
